document_data.caption: A map showing the Griffonpost House Inn (labeled #8) in Suldolphor.
document_data.name: Griffonpost House Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Griffonpost House Inn''' was an [[inn]] located in [[Suldolphor]] in eastern [[Calimshan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The inn was located near the center of Suldolphor on [[Ludluth Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Suldolphor}}
document_data.Description: The [[griffon]] head adorning the inn's sign was a welcoming sight to visitors.
document_data.Activities: Favored by travelers and merchants because of their size, cleanliness, and soundproof walls, the rooms of the Griffonpost House Inn had multiple suites so business could be conducted easily.
